name: Appinventor
tagline: Website to demonstrate work I've done on App Inventor
body:
### App Inventor Demo

I've created this page to demonstrate my work on App Inventor.  Use the download link to download tutorial.aia and tutorial.apk.

This application is pretty simple--right now it just shows a ball bouncing between ImageSprites and a counter at the bottom showing the total number of collisions.  I also made the ball decelerate over time.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
